pkgmetadata.longdescription: ##################flake8-codeclimate##################A Flake8 plugin to generate error reports in a format consumable by Code Climate.The `full error report specification <https://github.com/codeclimate/spec/blob/master/SPEC.md#data-types>`_includes a description of Code Climate specific error categories and fields.Installation============Install from PyPI:.. code-block:: bash $ pip install flake8-codeclimateOr from Git:.. code-block:: bash $ pip install -e git+git://github.com/bennylope/flake8-codeclimate.git#egg=flake8_codeclimateUsage=====Run Flake8 with the format option `codeclimate`:: flake8 --format=codeclimate
